org.gvsig.raster.impl.buffer

Interface SpiRasterQuery

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataQuery, Persistent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRasterQuery

    public interface SpiRasterQuery
extends DataQuery
    Raster query interface for providers.

      • getBufferForProviders

        Buffer getBufferForProviders()
        Buffer loaded by the provider and created by the store
        Returns:

      • setBufferResult

        void setBufferResult(Buffer buffer)
        The buffer is always built by the DataStore but in some cases it's necessary assign the result because the buffer has changed. In any case, It's advisable not to do it because the buffer for providers is replaced and next uses of this query would return an error.

      • getCacheStruct

        CacheStruct getCacheStruct()

      • setCacheStruct

        void setCacheStruct(CacheStruct cacheStruct)

      • requestIsTiled

        boolean requestIsTiled()

      • dontBuildBuffer

        void dontBuildBuffer()
        The buffer won't be built internally when all parameters will be calculated. Uses this call carefully. The provider must know that getBufferForProviders will return null.

      • createBuffer

        Buffer createBuffer(RasterDataStore store)
                    throws QueryException
        Throws:
